## Docker Images

```bash
# Multi-arch (default)
docker pull ghcr.io/nazq/tei-manager:${version}-tei-1.8.3

# Ada Lovelace (RTX 4090/4080)

# Hopper (H100/H200)
docker pull ghcr.io/nazq/tei-manager:${version}-tei-1.8.3-hopper
```
